# AVAudioSessionMicrophoneInjectionIsAvailableKey

**Global Variable**

A key to retrieve a Boolean value that indicates whether microphone injection is available.

## Declaration

```swift
let AVAudioSessionMicrophoneInjectionIsAvailableKey: String
```

## Discussion

The associated value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] that represents a Boolean value.
title: AVAudioSessionMicrophoneInjectionIsAvailableKey
